Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal with an extrusion depth of 0.1354, an opposite normal depth of 0.0, a sketch scale of 0.75, and a NewBodyFeatureOperation boolean operation. This part constitutes the slightly tapered middle section of the rectangular prism. The height, width, and length of this part are 0.7377, 0.1231, and 0.7377, respectively. The tapered part is centered in the image. **Final Shape: A rectangular prism with flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section.** The final shape has a height equal to twice its width.
